targets.query: SELECT mean("temp_c") FROM "smart_device" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "serial_no" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(last("time_iowait")) AS "iowait", non_negative_difference(last("time_nice")) AS "nice", non_negative_difference(last("time_system")) AS "system", non_negative_difference(last("time_user")) AS "user", non_negative_difference(last("time_iowait")) AS "iowait" FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("read_bytes"), $__interval) AS "read_bytes" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("name" !~ /^pass/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_error_rate"), 1s) AS "read_error_rate", non_negative_derivative(mean("seek_error_rate"), 1s) AS "seek_error_rate", non_negative_derivative(mean("udma_crc_errors"), 1s) AS "udma_crc_errors" FROM "smart_device" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "serial_no", "device", "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("write_bytes"), 10s) AS "write_bytes" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("name" !~ /^pass/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
